title: shrI shailapatiyE
sahitya:
shrI shailapatiyE tiruvaruL tandAL dayAnidhiyE vAnuyar


anupallavi

  Ashai maNDivaLar aDimaiyuLat-tezhundaruL varadA pashupatE ezhil migunda


caraNam    himAlaya tavak-kumArI oru bhAga mAlayanum ariyA aDimuDiyAi
samAna rahitA saccidAnanda svarUpanE shankaranE - kayilai nigar
